statements: DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 100 AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 200 AND treatment_history @> '{"diagnosis": "COVID-19"}';
DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 101 AND age > 50
DELETE FROM treatment_history WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith'
DELETE FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M' AND blood_type = 'A+';
DELETE FROM treatments WHERE doctor_id = 101 AND treatment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM treatment_history WHERE treatment_description LIKE '%surgery%';
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
